meaning: fall in love with, admire, grow senile

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to grow senile, to be childish with age, to be mentally slow, to be befuddled, to play stupid, to say something stupid (oft. on purpose; esp. as part of a comedic routine), to become engrossed in, to become absorbed in
to fall in love, to be in love, to be charmed with, to lose one's heart to
